input_args.passage: '25 Years Ago, David Wells Was Miraculously Perfect | It is one of the best stories from a storybook 1998 Yankees season, when David Wells through a perfect game despite imperfect circumstances.'
input_args.claim: 'After doing some research, we find out that "The Ignitor" is a nickname for Paul Molitor, a former Major League Baseball player who played for the Minnesota Twins in 1998.'
